item.title: Convert djvu files to a decently small pdf
item.description: Despite there are few decent djvu readers, they are not as comfortable as the pdf readers. Moreover, it is not really possible to open djvu files in eInk ebook readers. Additionally, if you have ever tried to convert djvu files to pdf (or ps), you should have noted that the output is either corrupted or unbelievably big. There is an hack that could come in help. Open your .bashrc (or .
